usefulItems: aluminium foil, bowl, baking tray (30 x 40 cm), oven grill
title: Lamb tikka with spicy eggplant

ingredients.content: 150 g brown onion, cut into eighths, segments separated
300 - 350 g eggplant, trimmed, quartered and cut into pieces (3 cm)
½ Lebanese cucumber, peeled, deseeded and cut into slices

preparations.content: Place garlic and ginger into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add yoghurt, paprika, garam masala, turmeric and salt and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer into a bowl. Add lamb, stir to coat and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place garlic and chilli into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add onion, oil, mustard seeds and ground coriander and cook <b>4 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Preheat oven grill. Line a large baking tray (40 x 30 cm) with aluminium foil and set aside.
Add eggplant to mixing bowl and cook <b>6-8 min/120°C//speed 1<b>, until softened.

Add tomatoes and salt and cook <b>10 min/120°C//speed 1<b>, placing simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid. Meanwhile, place lamb and marinade onto prepared baking tray and place on middle shelf of oven. Grill for 12-14 minutes, turning once,  until browned and cooked to your liking.
Serve lamb warm with eggplant, cucumber and yoghurt. Garnish with mint leaves and serve with roti on the side (optional).
